row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 6)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 14)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 3)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) >= 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 3)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 1)
col_desc: Queen has at least two mini challenge wins.
Queen has at least three lip sync wins.
Queen has one lip sync win.
